content: this legal text discusses the progress of a legal case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case number is sklep vrhovnega sodišča rs ii dor 372014 and it was decided on august 27 2015 the first step mentioned is the cost procedure which determines who is responsible for paying the legal costs the next step is the first instance judgment where a decision is made by the court the specific details of this judgment are not provided the text then mentions the supreme court and a monetary amount of 194468 it is unclear what this amount represents but it is stated that the plaintiffs costs are to be borne by the defendant the legal procedure in this case lasted until august 27 2015 the final resolution of the case is based on the judgment of the first instance the subject of the dispute is a specific apartment with ownership divided as 76 for the plaintiff and 24 for the defendant the supreme court rejected an application for revision in a court appeal case the text also discusses a legal decision made under the marriage family relations act where the court rejected the review of the judgment and ordered the defendant to reimburse the applicants costs the court determined that there is a joint property dispute between the parties involving the apartment the court dismissed the action both parties appealed and the appeals were dismissed now the defendant is requesting a revision of the case the value of the property is 6333333 eur and the defendant is seeking a declaration of 90 ownership the revision challenges the previous judgments the court of first instance awarded the applicant a 76100 coownership share amounting to 6333333 eur the applicant filed for a revision and the court deemed it admissible the supreme court dismissed the review and ordered the defendant to pay the applicants costs

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 37/2014, 27. 8. 2015
